title: TEA Platform Assurance Case Export Schema v1.0
description: Schema for TEA Platform assurance case exports in nested tree format. This is the authoritative specification for version 1.0 exports.

version.description: Schema version identifier. Version 1.0 is the first officially versioned export format.

exportedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the export was created

description.description: A description of the assurance case, such as its purpose and scope.

tree.description: The root node of the assurance case tree (typically a GOAL element)

ElementType.description: The type of assurance case element. Note: Context, Justification, and Assumption are now attributes, not standalone element types.

ElementRole.description: The role of a GOAL element

ModuleEmbedType.description: How a MODULE element embeds its referenced case

Comment.description: A comment attached to an element

author.description: Username or identifier of the comment author

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the comment was created

TreeNode.description: A node in the assurance case tree. Field availability depends on element type.

type.description: The element type determines which additional fields are valid

name.description: Display name (e.g., G1, S1, P1, E1)

inSandbox.description: Whether this element is in the sandbox (draft state)

comments.description: Comments attached to this element. Can be added to any element type.

fromPattern.description: Whether this element was created from a pattern template

modifiedFromPattern.description: Whether this element has been modified since being created from a pattern

isDefeater.description: Whether this element is a defeater (dialogical reasoning)

defeatsElementId.description: ID of the element this defeater targets

role.description: Role of the goal (TOP_LEVEL or SUPPORTING)

context.description: Context statements that define conditions under which the goal is valid

justification.description: Justification explaining why this goal is appropriate

assumption.description: Assumption that must hold for this goal to be valid

context.description: Context statements that define conditions under which the strategy applies

justification.description: Justification explaining why this decomposition strategy was chosen

assumption.description: Assumption that must hold for this strategy to be valid

level.description: Hierarchy level of the property claim (1 = direct child of goal/strategy)

context.description: Context statements that define conditions under which the claim is valid

justification.description: Justification explaining why this claim is relevant

assumption.description: Assumption that must hold for this claim to be valid

url.description: URL linking to the evidence source

then.description: Evidence elements cannot have context, justification, or assumption attributes

moduleReferenceId.description: ID of the case being referenced/embedded

moduleEmbedType.description: How the module embeds its referenced case

modulePublicSummary.description: Public summary of the module's content
